metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0812 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The interceptKeyBeforeDispatching function in policy/src/com/android/internal/policy/impl/PhoneWindowManager.java in Setup Wizard in Android 5.1.x before 5.1.1 LMY49G and 6.0 before 2016-02-01 does not properly check for setup completion, which allows physically proximate attackers to bypass the Factory Reset Protection protection mechanism and delete data via unspecified vectors, aka internal bug 25229538.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
